properties.name: gms.security.jwt.secret
properties.description: Defines the secret to be used for generating the JWT.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.expiration
properties.description: Defines the expiration time to be used for generating the JWT.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.token_type
properties.description: Defines the token type for receiving the JWT.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.header
properties.description: Defines the header for receiving the JWT.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.sign_up_url
properties.description: Defines the url for signing up the user.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.authorities_holder
properties.description: Defines the holder for the authenticated user's authorities.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.sign_in_url
properties.description: Defines the url for logging in the user.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.token_type_holder
properties.description: Defines the holder for the security.gms.jwt.token_type.

properties.name: gms.security.jwt.token_holder
properties.description: Defines the token holder for retrieving the JWT which should be used in further requests.

properties.name: gms.application.env
properties.description: Defines the environment in which the application is running.

properties.name: gms.user.default.name
properties.description: Defines name for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.user.default.lastName
properties.description: Defines last name for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.user.default.username
properties.description: Defines username for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.user.default.password
properties.description: Defines password for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.user.default.email
properties.description: Defines email for the first user created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.entity.default.name
properties.description: Defines name for the first entity created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.entity.default.username
properties.description: Defines username for the first entity created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.entity.default.description
properties.description: Defines description for the first entity created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.role.default.label
properties.description: Defines the label for the first role with administrative privileges created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.role.default.description
properties.description: Defines the description for the first role with administrative privileges created by default for the application on first start-up.

properties.name: gms.role.default.enabled
properties.description: Defines whether the first role with administrative privileges created by default for the application on first start-up is enabled or not.

properties.name: gms.config.multi-entity
properties.description: Defines whether application will support multiple entity registration or not.

properties.name: gms.config.user-registration-allowed
properties.description: Defines whether application will allow new users to be register via registration form or not.

properties.name: gms.config.api-docs.basePath
properties.description: Defines the base path for the api documentation resources.

properties.name: gms.config.page.size
properties.description: Defines the number of pages to chow when doing request to resources lists.

properties.name: gms.config.page.size_holder
properties.description: Defines the var where the number of pages to chow when doing request to resources lists will be placed.
